    • í˜„ëŒ€ì  ë„êµ¬ ë° ì§€ì› ë¼ì´ë¸ŒëŸ¬ë¦¬ì™€ í•¨ê»˜ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ë©´ ì •êµí•œ ë‹¨ì¼ í˜ì´ì§€ ì‘ìš©í”„ë¡œê·¸ë¨ì„ ì™„ë²½í•˜ê²Œ ì§€ì›í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŒ

    2. Vue.js ì‹œì‘ ë°©ë²•

    - CDN

    • í”„ë¡œí†  íƒ€ì´í•‘ ë˜ëŠ” í•™ìŠµ ëª©ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì‚¬ìš©í•  ì‹œ CDNìœ¼ë¡œ ê°„í¸í•˜ê²Œ ì‚¬ìš©
    <!-- html -->

<script src="https://unpkg.com/vue@next"></script>
<div id="app">
  <h1></h1>
</div>



    // js

Vue.createApp({
  data() {
    return {
      message: 'Hello Vue!'
    }
  }
}).mount('#app')


    - CLI

    • ë‹¨ì¼ í˜ì´ì§€ Appì„ ë¹ ë¥´ê²Œ êµ¬ì¶•í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ” ê³µì‹ CLI ì œê³µ
    # terminal

$ npm i -g @vue/cli
$ vue create vue3-test
ë²„ì „ ì„ íƒ
$ cd vue3-test
$ code .


    • ì½”ë“œ ê°€ë…ì„±ì„ ìœ„í•´ Vetur í™•ì¥ í”„ë¡œê·¸ë¨ ì„¤ì¹˜

    // App.vue êµ¬ì„±

// HTML
<template>
  <img alt="Vue logo" src="./assets/logo.png">
  <HelloWorld msg="Welcome to Your Vue.js App"/>  // ì œê±°í•˜ê³  ì‹œì‘
</template>

// JavaScript
<script>
import HelloWorld from './components/HelloWorld.vue'

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    HelloWorld
  }
}
</script>

// CSS
<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 60px;
}
</style>


    - Webpack

    # terminal

$ npx degit LeeWonWoo1/webpack-template-basic vue3-webpack-template
$ cd vue3-webpack-template
$ code . -r
$ npm i vue@next
$ npm i -D vue-loader@next vue-style-loader @vue/compiler-sfc



    // webpack.config.js

const path = require('path')
const HtmlPlugin = require('html-webpack-plugin')
const CopyPlugin = require('copy-webpack-plugin')
const { VueLoaderPlugin } = require('vue-loader')

module.exports = {
  resolve: {
    extensions: ['.js', '.vue']  // js, vue í™•ì¥ìë¥¼ ëª…ì‹œí•˜ì§€ ì•Šì•„ë„ ì—ëŸ¬ ë°œìƒ ë§‰ìŒ
  },
  entry: './src/main.js',
  output: {
    clean: true
  },
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.vue$/,  // .vueë¡œ ëë‚˜ëŠ” íŒŒì¼
        use: 'vue-loader'  // Webpackì—ì„œ vue íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì–´ë‚´ëŠ” ìš©ë„
      },
      {
        test: /\.s?css$/,
        use: [
          // ìˆœì„œ ì¤‘ìš”!
          'vue-style-loader',  // Vue íŒŒì¼ ë‚´ì˜ style íƒœê·¸ë¥¼ í•´ì„í•´ì„œ ë™ì‘ì‹œí‚¤ëŠ” ìš©ë„
          'style-loader',
          'css-loader',
          'postcss-loader',
          'sass-loader'
        ]
      },
      {
        test: /\.js$/,
        use: [
          'babel-loader'
        ]
      }
    ]
  },
  plugins: [
    new HtmlPlugin({
      template: './index.html'
    }),
    new CopyPlugin({
      patterns: [
        { from: 'static' }
      ]
    }),
    new VueLoaderPlugin()  // ìƒì„±ì í•¨ìˆ˜ë¡œ í˜¸ì¶œ
  ],
  devServer: {
    host: 'localhost'
  }
}


    • ë£¨íŠ¸ ê²½ë¡œì— src í´ë”ë¥¼ ìƒì„±í•˜ê³ 
    • src í´ë” ì•ˆì— main.js íŒŒì¼ ë§Œë“¤ê¸°
    • src í´ë” ì•ˆì— App.vue íŒŒì¼ ë§Œë“¤ê¸°
    • ê¸°ì¡´ js í´ë”ëŠ” ì‚­ì œ
    // App.vue

<template>
  <h1></h1>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      message: "Hello Vue!!",
    };
  },
};
</script>



    // src/main.js

import { createApp } from 'vue'
import App from './App'

createApp(App).mount('#app')



    <!-- index.html -->

<body>
  <div id="app"></div>
</body>



    # terminal

$ npm run dev



    • ê¸°ì¡´ static í´ë” ë‚´ë¶€ì˜ images í´ë”ë¥¼ src í´ë” ë‚´ë¶€ë¡œ ì´ë™
    • images í´ë”ì˜ ì´ë¦„ì„ assetsë¡œ ë³€ê²½
    • src í´ë” ë‚´ë¶€ì— components í´ë” ìƒì„±
    • components í´ë” ë‚´ë¶€ì— HelloWorld.vue íŒŒì¼ ìƒì„±



    # terminal

$ npm i -D file-loader



    // webpack.config.js

const path = require('path')
const HtmlPlugin = require('html-webpack-plugin')
const CopyPlugin = require('copy-webpack-plugin')
const { VueLoaderPlugin } = require('vue-loader')

module.exports = {
  resolve: {
    extensions: ['.js', '.vue'],
    alias: {  // ê²½ë¡œ ë³„ì¹­
      '~': path.resolve(__dirname, 'src'),
      'assets': path.resolve(__dirname, 'src/assets')
    }  
  },
  entry: './src/main.js',
  output: {
    clean: true
  },
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.vue$/,
        use: 'vue-loader'
      },
      {
        test: /\.s?css$/,
        use: [
          'vue-style-loader',
          'style-loader',
          'css-loader',
          'postcss-loader',
          'sass-loader'
        ]
      },
      {
        test: /\.js$/,
        use: [
          'babel-loader'
        ]
      },
      {
        test: /\.(png|jpe?g|gif|webp)$/,  // png, jpg, jpeg, git, webpë¡œ ëë‚˜ëŠ” íŒŒì¼
        use: 'file-loader'
      }
    ]
  },
  plugins: [
    new HtmlPlugin({
      template: './index.html'
    }),
    new CopyPlugin({
      patterns: [
        { from: 'static' }
      ]
    }),
    new VueLoaderPlugin()
  ],
  devServer: {
    host: 'localhost'
  }
}



    // src/components/HelloWorld.vue

<template>
  <img src="~assets/bear.jpg" alt="Bear" />
</template>



    // src/App.vue

<template>
  <h1></h1>
  <HelloWorld />
</template>

<script>
import HelloWorld from "~/components/HelloWorld";

export default {
  components: {
    HelloWorld,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      message: "Hello Vue!!",
    };
  },
};
</script>



    3. ESLint êµ¬ì„±

    # terminal

$ npm i -D eslint eslint-plugin-vue babel-eslint


    • ë£¨íŠ¸ ê²½ë¡œì— .eslintrc.js íŒŒì¼ ìƒì„±
    // .eslintrc.js

module.exports = {
  env: {  // browser, node í™˜ê²½ì—ì„œ ë™ì‘í•˜ëŠ” ì „ì—­ ê°œë…ë“¤ì„ ëª¨ë‘ ì½”ë“œ ê²€ì‚¬
    browser: true,
    node: true
  },
  extends: [  // ì‚¬ìš© ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ ê·œì¹™ ì„¸íŠ¸
    // vue
    // 'plugin:vue/vue3-essential',  // Lv1
    'plugin:vue/vue3-strongly-recommended',  // Lv2
    // 'plugin:vue/vue3-recommended',  // Lv3
    // js
    'eslint:recommended'
  ],
  parserOptions: {  // êµ¬ë¬¸ ë¶„ì„í•  íŒ¨í‚¤ì§€ ì„¤ì •(Babel, ES6^ => ES5)
    parser: 'babel-eslint'
  },
  rules: {  // ì¶”ê°€ì ì¸ ì½”ë“œ ê·œì¹™ ì„¤ì •
    "vue/html-self-closing": ["error", {
      "html": {
        "void": "always",
        "normal": "never",
        "component": "always"
      },
      "svg": "always",
      "math": "always"
    }],
    "vue/html-closing-bracket-newline": ["error", {
      "singleline": "never",
      "multiline": "never"
    }]
  }
}



    // setting.json

// ì €ì¥ì‹œ eslint í˜•ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ ìë™ ì½”ë“œ ì •ë ¬
"editor.codeActionsOnSave": {
    "source.fixAll.eslint": true
}



    // src/components/HelloWorld.vue

<template>
  <img
    src="~assets/bear.jpg"
    alt="Bear" />
  <div></div>
</template>
